title: React Authentication
description: Learn how to implement secure authentication in your React applications using modern best practices.

title: Firebase Integration
description: Integrate Firebase into your project to enable real-time database, authentication, and hosting features.

title: Responsive Dashboard
description: Build a responsive dashboard layout that adapts seamlessly to all device sizes using React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Assignment Submission System
description: Create a system for users to submit assignments, track their progress, and receive feedback efficiently.

title: Grading & Feedback Module
description: Develop a grading and feedback module that allows instructors to review, grade, and provide comments on student submissions.
